revised_title: A Study of the Galle Variety of Thorianite and its Radioactivity
tldr: The authors analyzed a variety of thorianite from Galle, Ceylon, and found that it contains a higher proportion of uranium oxides and less thorium oxide compared to the ordinary form of thorianite. They also discovered that this variety is radioactive and contains helium. The authors concluded that the Galle variety of thorianite should not be considered a new mineral species due to the natural variation in the proportions of thorium and uranium oxides in minerals found in different localities.
